name: Bogdan Covaciu
description: Bogdan is the author of our friendly mascot, worked on all design related projects from wallpapers to media pamphlets, software testing and forum moderation.

name: Oğuz Kağan Eren
description: Oğuz was the wiki maintainer and developer of some native applications.

name: Dan Johansen
description: Dan was involved in ARM builds and testing.

name: Jonathon Fernyhough
description: Jonathon was involved with 32bit builds package maintenance and the forum.

name: Hugo Posnic
description: Hugo was the author of manjaro hello and manjaro-web-repo along with contributions for pacman-mirrors and public relations in trade shows.

name: Ramon Buldó
description: Ramon initially developed Manjaro Settings Manager with kde integration.

name: Roland Singer
description: Roland was one of the founders and developed the initial infrastructure and tools.
